1.content:
The obvious first choice:

Peter Parker/Spider-Man: Titular Web-Spinning, Wall-Crawling, Wise-Cracking Arachnid-Themed Defender of New York. At hand to take on and take down criminals and supervillians who lay beyond the reach of standard Law Enforcement.

Dr Curtis Connors/The Lizard: Brilliantly-gifted herpetologist who lost most of his arm in a battlefield injury when he was in the US Armed Forces. His attempts to develop a means of regenerating lost limbs, canonically, led to the birth of his monstrous alter-ego.

Mary-Jane Watson: Girlfriend/Wife of Peter Parker, and often the one to provide the emotional support when he needs it.

Someone Else (Hero) There's plenty of others who can feature within this story setting

Someone Else (Villain): There's plenty of villains to choose from. ^_^
1.title: Who to begin with?

choices: Swinging along the New York Skyline

1111.content:
He woke up and began to realize something was different. He rolled over be surprised by the back of another person, one that didn't have any clothing on. Almost like on cue the person woke up because of the bed shaking and rolled over. Her breasts flopped over and she had little prickles where her ginger pubic hairs were coming in a five o'clock shadow on her bare vagina. "Mary Jane! Why are you naked in my bed?" Peter whispered. MJ just yawned and said, "Your aunt is out for the week remember, she won't hear us." "Why are you naked in my bed?" MJ started looking both worried and a little angry, "Peter do you not remember the wild night we had last night?" Peter, "The last thing I remember was the field trip to the MIT lab." MJ, "That was a week ago Peter!" Peter looked at MJ and she started to get shaky and cried out, "I swear Peter we fucked consensually!" Peter, "I'm sure but I cannot remember the past week?" He looked at the clock, "Where did the week go?" He thought back and a week rushed over him. He feel back in a seizure and MJ rolled him over and decided to call 911, she needed to save Peter plus either way, if she ran and let him die or called the paramedics she'd get caught anyways. Peter awoke to a still naked Mary Jane and a group of paramedics asking him if he was okay. Unfortuatly one of them was a friend of both Aunt may and MJ's parents. MJ got a call and she slunk back home to be yelled at by her folks. Aunt may called and Peter thought he was fucked, again, but in a different way, "Hey May", this is the younger Homecoming style Aunt May. "Peter what's this you had MJ over and fucked her?" Peter was raised a good Catholic boy and so he knew his parents wanted him to wait until marriage, "Yeah May." May, "Was it good?" "Uh, yes." "Good cause you're grounded and I forbid you to have, uh, any fun until I decide you've learned your lesson." "Yeah, that's fair." "And p.s., Niiiiice. MJ is cute." "May!"

2 days later

May came home and by this time MJ's parents wanted to have a good talking to with Peter and May. They did and it seems MJ was pregnant. May literally started slapping Peter, "Not only did you have sex with a girl but you forgot protection, the hell is wrong with you Pete. You're going to find a way to care for this child, while you both are still in school. Understand?" Pete, "Yeah May." May, "I can't believe my nephew beat me to the kid game." Peter had multiple memory lapses over the next few months and each time he remembered a little more from that week. He was bitten by a spider, he became brash and cocky, which led to the MJ incident and that is all. He made an appointment with the lead doctor, Dr. Connors and he told Pete that the spider was a first step in manufacturing a strong material to replace ropes. However, he wasn't sure what would happen with a human bitten by it.

As he walked out the door a mysterious woman came up to him and told him she could teach him how to use his abilities. He refused and she handed him a paper and said, "These are your powers." He went to throw it away and the paper stuck, as he was trying to dislodge the paper he punched through a was and realized the bricks were stuck too, as one fell he felt a tingle in that direction and reacted so quickly the brick seemed to fall in slow motion. Finally he went back to the woman and she trained him. There was another complication.

112.content:
The New York Night brought a new type of life to the City, and a lot of it not being of the best variety. This is why Spider-Man was swinging across the skyline, keeping a sharp lookout for any danger that might require his presence to rectify.

"Ah, nothing like a quiet night for once." He sighed as he perched himself atop a ledge, his Spider Mutation from that bite a few years back allowing him to keep a solid purchase even if he had been standing on the horizontal.

And it was a quiet night, no robberies that needed him there, the NYPD dealing with it without needing his help, and no super-powered villains that would force him into action lately.

So when his Spider-Sense kicked him, alerting him to immanent danger, he barely had enough time to bite back a sarcastic remark before turning his attention to the source of said danger.
112.title: Swinging along the New York Skyline

choices: He uses stealth to enter the building.
He breaks in force-ably, loud and obvious.
1121.content:
Headed right for him, a bright green missile races across the sky. He barely has enough time to shoot a web ball at it. In fact, even though he does, he's still close enough to the explosion he is blasted off the ledge he was standing on.

As he fell through the sky, still processing this new information, another came from out of the corner of his eye. He had more time to react though, so he shoots it down without a problem. He then darts away from where he suspects the missiles to be coming from.

He hides for a few long moments, and is apparently out of range of the unknown attacker.

Suddenly, he makes a startling revelation. Both of the missiles had flight paths that made the Oscorp building a likely launch site. While it doesn't make perfect sense, if they are willing to attack him in what is basically the open, he must strike back.

What does he do?
1121.title: Incoming Missile!

choices: Dr Connors believes he can help
Dr Connors is unable to help
1123.content:
No sooner had his Spider-Sense subsided, Spider-Man was forced to clutch at the sides of his abdomen as they became wracked with an intense pain, almost like something wanted to push itself out from it. So focused on this, his hold on the ledge gave as he began to fall towards the ground, barely able to keep one hand on the wall to slow his fall until he could re-secure his grip as the pain faded.

“What……what was that?” He groaned out, it being a very new sensation to him. “Felt like a massage of my innards, by Wolverine.” He added as he made for the rooftop where he would have a much safer place to think.

Barely a minute passed before he decided that it was completely unnatural, and it would help if he were to seek help, and for that he knew who the first port of call would be. Sending out a web line, he allowed the Force of Gravity to power him down then along as he swung his way over to the Empire State University.

‘Connors is one of the top experts in Biology and Genetics,’ Spider-Man thought to himself as he made it to the ESU Rooftop, working his way down to Connors’ Office/Lab. ‘So if there’s anyone here who can figure it out if there‘s something wrong with me, it’s him.’

Reaching the correct window, he was in luck, seeing Dr Connors leaning into a microscope and taking down a note with his one remaining hand. Or at least he was until he heard the rapping at the window.

“Spider-Man?” He queried as he opened the window to let him in. “Is there something I can help you with?”

“Yeah.” Spider-Man started before a fresh surge of pain shot through him, though thankfully not as severe as the first one which let him stay on his feet. “Something’s up with me, I need you to take a look and see what it is.”

It was probably seeing him buckle over and clutch his sides that convinced Connors that something wasn’t right with him, since he agreed. “Alright then, I do owe you after all.”

And did he, for similar to Spider-Man he had a “condition” of his own. Though where in his case it was accidental, for Connors, it had been intentional, with unintended consequences. The result of an attempt to re-grow his right arm by mixing Lizard DNA with his own, resulting in his becoming the Reptilian Menace dubbed The Lizard. Spider-Man had been instrumental in reversing the effects for him, allowing him his life back.

So with a sample of his blood, Dr Connors set to work analysing the sample while Spider-Man waited on the wall.

“So what’s the word Doc?” He asked having waited long enough.

“Interesting…” Connors murmured to himself before facing Spider-Man. “You weren’t born with your powers, weren’t you?”

“Umm. Yeah.” He replied. ‘I’d best not let him know too much though, or he might work out who I am.’

“Well, however you got your powers. It appears to have stabilised at its current point, but that is changing.” Connors delivered the news. “It appears another mutation is now occurring within you.”

“Another? Into what!?” Spider-Man didn’t take the news very well.

“I, I honestly don’t know.” Dr Connors admitted. “But it may not be what you’d consider to be……human.” ‘In fact, it could be very alike what I went through.’ He added in his mind.

"Well is there anything you can do?" Spider-Man asked him with a growing sense of dread.
1123.title: Intense cramping pain at his sides

Travelling - Even as a Man-Spider, he must keep up with his work, which does mean travel to and from his various offices to personally see what's happening, as well as meetings with various officials and 'partners' to keep his Company on Top.
11511222.title: Man-Spider:  The Boss

choices: He concludes it's best to maintain appearances, leaves all his suit on
He decides to take a few pieces off
He chooses to strip down completely
115112221.content:
“..And after the 11 meeting with Dr Connors, there is the matter of Oscorp at 3.” Ms Cooperton relayed the critical items on the day’s agenda to her boss.

While she could see him right now with the high-backed chair facing away from her, she was under no illusion as to who - and what - sat there and steeled herself to face him. It.

Six arms whose hands held three clawed digits sharpened to a point and as many red eyes atop a lengthened head complete with mandibles on its upper jaw. Coated in purple-grey hair that travelled down to his twin-clawed feet hidden inside a pair of black shoes tailored to a perfect fit, steel-capped to protect them from said claws. The navy-blue jacket and trousers, along with the black sweater and socks - all equally tailored to fit his frame - completing the attire.

“Good.” His voice seeming to reverberate slightly in his throat as he viewed the details for himself.

His reality for the past twelve years now, ever since he’d been bitten by a radioactive spider that, somehow, had managed to transfer some of its genetic coding to him, turning him into this, thing. Only then, had he learned just how cruel the world could be, how sick some people could truly be.

Forced to flee, he’d spent time either in hiding, or persecution just for being what he was, igniting a dark fire within him that even now, had failed to extinguish. Some small time thievery - with the odd bigger one - had permitted him just enough funding to serve as collateral as he began the process of striking back, setting up his company and building it up any way he could. So long as he kept up with the taxes, kept his more unsavoury acts hidden, and held the right people in line, the authorities tended to look the other way. All of which served to make Parker Enterprises in seven short years, the single largest Biological/Genetic Research and Development Corporation in the US. Such a position gifting him with significant clout with which to maintain good ties with the right sorts, and indulge in a few ‘pursuits’ he’d come to enjoy.

And with some particularly "gifted" personnel to keep it that way.

“So tell me. Does my appearance, offend you?” He asked rhetorically.

“N-no.” Ms Cooperton knew better than to say yes if the supposed rumours concerning her predecessors were anything to go by.

“Good. You may return to your desk.” He dismissed her with a wave of a hand.

Ms Cooperton wasn’t a particularly bad secretary, in fact she performed her duties rather well was what he thought as he sat back down and scanned the paperwork that needed his attention. But she was prone to become rather nervous around him, especially when he was rather less-well dressed, he could still remember clearly the look on her face when she saw him standing on the ceiling completely stripped down.

Not an uncommon event in his offices given some of those under his employ - those such as Dr Stegron for example - but there were always those who took offence to this…leeway. Not that they lasted long in his workforce.

The strayed thoughts in turn led him to himself, pondering whether or not he wanted to ditch his suit.
115112221.title: Start of the workday for Man-Spider

choices: Time for Man-Spider to attend the 11am meeting with Dr Connors
Allison Anderson & Dr Stegron's Investigation Begins
1151122213.content:
“Well why not? It’s my office after all.” He chuckled out as his hands were already opening his pants and pulling them down his legs, even as another pair opened his jacket.

Kicking free the pants revealed both a lack of underwear, and a thick purple-coloured penis that was pulsing, thickening, lengthening, rising.

“Nice that something stayed the same.” He spoke to himself, the simple fact that it remained somewhat as it had before being a source of comfort for him, both in the early years and today.

The jacket joining his pants, he took more care with the sweater, mindful of his claws that could cut through it with no effort. But with that taken care of he could return to his work.

Pacing around his office as he read them over. Most of them were routine and straightforward, the current cash flow, employee timekeeping, new hires and fires, one interesting piece on Parker Enterprises efforts to expand into the Southern Americas. But one made him stop in the middle of the room.

On the surface it looked like any other financial report, but the more he read it, the more he noticed that something wasn’t right as he was already at his desk and making a call.

“Ms Cooperton, inform Miss Anderson that I need her in my office right now.” He instructed his secretary plain and clear.

[+]

Minutes later and Miss Anderson was entering his office. Like himself she wasn’t entirely human, and wearing about as much he was. Emerald-green (top of head, arms legs, back, and tail) and lime-green (front of face and neck, abs, inner thighs and underside of tail) scales save for the dark leaf-green that marked the areola on her mid-C Cup breasts. Boots that reached her knees, a wrist device, and an ID Tag/Swipecard that hung around her neck all she had on.

“You wished to see me Mr Parker?” She rasped.

“Yes. Take a seat please.” She complied as she took the offered seat, her tail sliding through the provided gap with ease. “I have a particular task I need you to do, and it must remain off-record. Is that understood?” He stated bluntly, his red eyes piercing into her own yellow ones.

“I understand. What is the task?” She went straight to the point.

“Look at this.” He offered the report to her. “Someone, has been siphoning funds from, ‘certain’ Parker Enterprises Accounts. And what I want is for you to take Dr Stegron, trace the source and, rectify it.” They both knew full well what he meant by ‘rectifying’ the situation.

“I’ll see that it’s done. And I take it this is to begin now.” That wasn’t a question, only an understanding.

“Precisely Allison. And I don’t need to tell you to keep this below the radar.”

“I’ll see to it.” She rose and let herself out, the need for further discussion not there as the Man-Spider seethed at this development.

‘So someone saw fit to try and steal from me did they? Well, whoever they are, they won’t be around long enough to regret it.’ He silently fumed while making sure he hadn’t fallen behind in his work.
1151122213.title: Man-Spider:  Naked on the Job & a Meeting

12.title: Dr Connors/Lizard

choices: He heads for the Empire State University (ESU)
He heads out to gather more supplies
124.content:
If there was one thing that New York had in its favour for one particular resident, it was the sheer size of its sewer system, easily enough space to both hide and move around in while avoiding unwanted attention.

Following the loss of half of his right arm, Doctor Curtis Connors had sought a means of regaining it, turning to the study of reptiles that had such a natural restorative capability, and seeking to introduce this ability into humans. Years of research finally saw him ready to test it, and seeing no better candidate than one who’d already lost a limb, used himself as the first test subject.

It worked.

But not without cost.

As well as restoring his lost limb, it had continued to mutate him until he had become a mix between human and lizard. Unable to face his wife, Martha, he had fled into the sewers where he could hide himself away from the world, until he could find a means of reversing what he had done to himself.

Within a corner of them, he had made himself a small makeshift lab where he could conduct his work without fear of exposure. A small mat lay in a nearby corner for when he needed to sleep.

He’d spent the last several weeks gathering first the materials and equipment needed to construct his new lab, then what he needed for his plans to work. It had been difficult for him, but with some good timing, maintenance of a watchful eye, and a little bit of luck, he had gathered most of what he had needed without detection.

Not that that had been easy for him.

Taking a short break, he looked at himself. When he had fled his home, and wife, his clothes had still been in a relatively decent condition, minus the footwear which had been torn off by his far larger feet and tears by the knees of his deep-purple pants.

Now, the harsh living conditions and work had taken a toll on his attire, the entire right sleeve of his black sweater lost during a heavy fall when the waste in the dump slid on top of him as he’d been gathering supplies, leaving his right pectoral and shoulder blade bare as well, with one other tear down the left bicep to enable green scales to peek out through the dirty fabric. His old pants now more like shorts that failed to reach the knees now. Only his Lab Coat was still in a somewhat decent condition, and that was on account his tendency to leave it behind when heading out, not wishing it to suffer unnecessary damage.

Now he looked to his work, as he decided on his next course of action.
124.title: New York - Sewers

141.content:
So what may be happening with her?

Living Underground: So Gila's living in the New York Sewer System alongside others of her young kind. What might she be doing as she resides just beneath the Humans view? What are her plans? Her ambitions in Life?

Living Topside: So she's living on the surface? Why? Is she residing there by choice? Might she be cooped up in a Lab somewhere?
141.title: Gila

1411.content:
So Gila resides in the Network of Sewers that rest beneath New York City, meaning that she'll almost certainly be living with the other Humanoid Lizards that came as a result of their ingesting of the Regenerative Serum that was flushed into said Sewers, which in turn is what has granted them their much-increased intellect alongside their bipedal humanoid bodies.

So now all that's needed before the story begins in earnest is to select a location and a scenario:


Coliseum: Set in one of the larger (and otherwise unused) chambers. Easily able to take a few hundred in relative comfort where gladiatoral battles are conducted to sate the more bloodthirsty desires of many of them. This would see Gila becoming increasingly concerned that this may grow into a far more savage desire to take the surface world by force.

Surface Run: In this case, Gila would be making a Surface Run to "collect" certain goods, foodstuffs, and other desirables that are required for wanted for their habitation. She may be performing a solo run, or be operating as part of a small team as they take what they're after.

Reconnaissance: Gila is (either alone or not) conducting a Reconnaissance Mission either to search out potential help or threats, or to seek out places to hide, live, or use.
1411.title: Living Underground

14122.content: So Gila lives in somewhere in New York City, above the ground, and with others. Who might they be then? Human? Lizardmen?

141222.content:
So Gila resides with others of her kind, who might the others be? Here are some options, plus some physical stats for them and Gila:


1) Gecko - Male Gecko Lizard Humanoid with a prominent crest at the top-back of his skull. 190cm (about 6ft3) but less muscular than other males of his kind, built more for agility and endurance than sheer strength. Dark blue scales abound save for the light blue-white that rests where his underside would be in an ordinary lizard.

2) Gila - 201cm (about 6ft7) and GG-Cup breasts. Dark Green scales mainly but the front of her face, abs and underside of her tail are a lime-green. Lightly muscled and build more for endurance and agility as opposed to brute force.

3) Iguara - Female Iguanoid Humanoid noted by the large flap that runs from the base of her collar bone to the tip of her lower jaw. 210cm (about 6ft11) and heavily muscled build with notable (though not ridiculous) bust size, being in the D-Range. Predominantly dark olive green scales but light white-green for her palms, soles, and from the breasts down her abs to a short way down the underside of her tail. Spines run from the top of her head to the back of her neck.

4) Kregg - Male Crocodilian Humanoid, 282cm (about 9ft3) with a thick heavy build. A very dark green with paler underside, and a double ridge running from the top of his head to the base of his tail.

5) Lunette - Female Whiptail Lizard-Woman, smallest of this group at 178cm (about 5ft10) and the least muscled body. Mainly soft-leaf green with paler green underside with EE-Cup breasts.
141222.title: Lizardmen Companions

1412221.content:
...and that is to decide where the start point for this will be. The choices are as follows:

1) Home - The new home where they live as opposed to their older dwellings within the Sewers. They all work nightshift with associated nightshift bonus allowances to their standard pay, and with those three incomes, they can afford a comfortable one in a decent part of Manhattan Island.

2) Work - In this instance, it would follow Gila in her workplace as she works the nightshift hours, managing all the paperwork and other tasks to clear backlogs and set up the office for the main staff during the day once she’s left. Perhaps she gets up to other unrelated ‘tasks’ while she’s at it.

3) Vacation - Having saved up enough for one, they can now have some time just to themselves and have some fun. Whether it be a camping trip or to some location of interest to them.
1412221.title: Only one thing needed now...

141222122.content: Then what are they doing for their vacation? Are they on a camping trip? Or might they be going to a resort or something to that effect?
141222122.title: Vacation Time

1412221221.content:
“So how much longer ‘til we get there again?” Lunette asked as she stifled a yawn, leaning heavily on the fixed table.

“Perhaps another hour, an hour-and-a-half-tops.” Gila rasped back, not taking her eyes off the road (as she was driving at that time) and starting to become irritated with her regular questioning.

Making a little over $57,000 pa between their combined pay-checks, getting this RV they were travelling in hadn’t been particularly difficult, even if it was second-hand. Twenty-four and a half feet in length, eight wide, 12,000lb load limit. It was far from a bad choice, if a little cosy considering their…dimensions, and still needing to modify the three seats in it given their tails. Double bed and bathroom at the back, wardrobe kitchen and door in the middle, and couch and armchair behind the cab. All things considered though, it did fulfil their needs.

“I guess I could wait then,” Lunette began again. “I just, I just wish I could ditch these things already.” She pointed to the clothes she wore, blouse and skirt being what could be seen at the moment.

“I know that.” Gecko took his turn to enter the conversation. “But until we’re safely off the roads we do need to keep ourselves covered, as per the conditions set us when we were granted the right to live on the Surface.” His wear at the moment was a pair of dark jeans and black oval-neck sweater, though like Lunette, he was currently barefoot as well.

“And I get what you mean. I too, would love to be able to pull everything off and let the sun hit nothing but my scales, and go around just the way nature intended, but until we’re there, and safely out of sight, that will have to wait.” Gila was the only one still to have footwear on, a simple set of low-heeled slip-ons, a dark purple jacket and trousers with a thin black v-neck sweater to finish off her visible attire.

“I suppose so. I guess I just can’t wait to get there.” Lunette started to rest her head on her arms before perking up, an idea coming to her. “Say? The last part is dirt track, no-one to see us. So what if we, ditch this stuff then?” Her suggesting caught the attention of her companions, as they looked to each other for a brief moment, considering her proposal before coming up with their answer.
1412221221.title: Off to their Site

choices: They're not alone when they arrive
14122212211.content:
“You know.” Gila began after thinking over Lunette’s suggestion. “That’s something I didn’t consider.” A smile pulled itself on her face as she scanned the road ahead for the turnoff they were aiming for.

“So it’s a yes?” Lunette’s eyes lit up in hope.

“Only once we’re out of sight.” Gecko replied. “Until then, the clothes stay on.”

“Okay then.” She wasn’t dejected too much, after all it wouldn’t be that long before they were off the main road.

[+]

Some thirty-five minutes later and they had left the road behind them, the RV bouncing on the rougher dirt roads.

“Now?” Lunette asked impatiently, scanning the windows.

“Now.” Was Gila’s one-word response.

“Finally!” Lunette cheered as she was very quick to open her blouse and throw it away, her skirt following it seconds later and revealing that she’d neglected underwear beneath them as she leaned back and sighed. “That’s, much, better.” One leg raised over the armrest.

“Guess you really needed to let it all out, didn’t you?” Gecko chuckled as he moved his now-topless self off his seat and discarded his jeans and briefs before turning to face Gila. “If you want, I can drive the rest of the way.”

“Thanks.” Gila replied softly as she pulled the RV over and put it in Park, letting Gecko settle his naked frame in the drivers’ seat before she started peeling off her sweater.

“You wear those?” Lunette queried, pointing to the solid orange bra Gila had on, its colour clashing with that of her scales.

“They help to hold them up.” Gila explained as her pants came off, the stockings and suspenders, semi-transparent black with underwear the same orange as her bra, before settling herself in the side couch.

“So why leave them on now?”

“Perhaps because I want to keep them on for the time being.” Gila turned to look forwards. “From where we are, perhaps another forty minutes then we’re there. We set up camp, think I might ditch the rest either when we get there, or after setting up.”

“Come to think of it.” Gecko cut in. “What about our, old ones? The old ones we had?” He referred to their old clothes, the torn-up rags they’d scavenged before they came to live on the surface and were able to purchase proper good ones.

“I’ve brought them with us.” Gila replied. “So if we ever feel like it…” There was no need for her to finish it, they all knew what she meant by it.

The forest was closing in on them now as they carefully navigated their way through the narrowing track, but this meant they were getting closer to their destination, where they could have ten days to themselves, to simply be themselves.
14122212211.title: Our Clothes?  Let's Lose 'Em

14523.content:
Cindy was waiting up. She was not happy, this was the weekend in a row her husband was out all hours of the night with the guys. Tonight was later than usual. She began fearing the worst and went out to search.

Her search started at the bar. The bar tender told her that that Harold, Cindy's husband, was last seen by him heading out the door with the group he came in with. He was the only one without a girl around his arms. Cindy sighed in relief and told the tender, "I'm his wife so if he had a floozy around his arm it'll be hell for him." He laughed and said, "Oh Cindy I know all about you. He makes sure no girl in this bar thinks he's single."

After swinging around until dawn she finally came home. Harold wasn't there. It was around noon when the door unlocked and a very hungover Harold came in, "Hey babe sorry about last night, I got way too drunk and crashed at Mark's. Did I ever text you? Never-mind your demeanor says differently." Cindy, "I worried. I didn't sleep. In fact I spent half the night walking the city trying to find you." Harold, "What! You shouldn't have. A lone woman at night, I had a group you were alone." Cindy, "I can handle myself. Call it Ezekiel's training." Harold, "Even though you can fight off attackers doesn't mean you won't get attacked." Cindy, "Then come home when around when you say you will, or at least text me. You know what I'm heading out, I need to clear my head." Harold, "Cindy." She slammed the door.

When she returned Harold was out again.

She walked back into the bar he frequents and saw him, "Drinking again." He looked at her and said, "It's just how I cope." She sat next to him and said, "That's dangerous. I'm your wife, I should be how you cope. The alcohol should just be a side effect to the fun, not something you lean on." He looked at her, smiled, turned to the bar tender and said, "Can I get my tab." He finished his drink, paid, and took Cindy out to the park.

About a week later Harold's friends asked him out again. He came back at dawn drunk as a sailor. She was unhappy about that, and even more so that he was sloppily trying to get some. He wouldn't stop and Cindy decided to reveal to him her powers, and use it to teach him the brevity of her anger. He was already naked when he started trying to coax her into sex. He backed him up against the wall and he relaxed to the point of sleeping. She webbed his wrists and connected them to the roof. Then she webbed his ankles and connected them to the floor. She then webbed his closed mouth so he didn't pique the neighbor's worries. She slid his credit card out of it's wallet and thought, "What's his is mine, and mine is his. No harm in him gifting me a shopping spree in apology for his drinking problem. A few hours later he awoke he noticed the soreness in his arms and legs and realized he was naked, his mind told him he was standing but he feet told him he was not on the floor. That is when he noticed past his penis was webbing. He saw it and that he was off the ground, he looked up, webs holding his arms to the roof. He thought he was home and called out Cindy, "Gnndn!" That is when he figured his mouth had webs on it too. He was confused and began worrying about last night. 'I didn't pick up any girls or guys for that matter. I don't think I was followed home, I don't feel like I've been violated. I'm definitely home.' That is when Cindy walked out of the bedroom, naked. Harold, "Gnndn! Thhng Ghd nhh'rm hp, Hm'm wmbbmd hp hvmr hmrm. Hmlp mm! Gnndn! Hm gnhw nhh ghn hmrm mm! Gnndn! Gnndn plmhfm." Cindy, "(Sigh) I hear you, but I don't want to hear it. You've been out all night last night, and at dawn. DAWN! You came in and expected sex. I've decided that you decided that in apology for staying out all night, every weekend, for a month, that you are allowing me to have a day out with your credit card." Harold, "Hm'vm dmgndmd nh fhgh thnng! Whh dh nhh gnhw thht ghn wmb lngm thnf?" Cindy, "Ugh, you so loud I'm trying to eat. I'll be back before those webs degrade and then, oh, your really going to hear my mind. That is unless you shut up and let me have my day." Harold hung there watching Cindy eat breakfast, then get dressed and began walking out. As she walked up to him, kissed him, and said, "Close your eyes, I have a surprise for you. She saw he got hard and closed his eyes, she said, "Not that kind of surprise. Your still in trouble." He opened his eyes and saw he dressed as silk. "I'm a spider-based super hero." He got wide eyed and she just said, "Close your eyes again." He did and she webbed his eyes and said, "I'll be back in a few hours." She returned

1453122.content:
She was at a party she wasn't supposed to go to. Dad had taken Peter to the library, nerd, and she had tricked Mom into taking her to her friends, the two of you walked to the party, for a sleepover. May was in her underwear looking down at the sexy hunk she had gone upstairs with in his boxers. Her phone buzzed, she ignored it. It buzzed again, she sighed and despite Juan saying, "See what's the matter I'll wait." she ignored the phone.

A half an hour later

The police had silently surrounded the party and busted everyone. May was booked and sat there waiting for her parents. An hour passed before the police came to pick her up, but instead of taking her out they took her into an office. The officer sitting on the other side of the desk stood up, "Miss Parker?" She confirmed and the officer told her to take a seat. The officer sat down and told her that about three hours ago her father Ben was murdered while waiting for her cousin. Upon going to pick her up her mother May was in a car accident and didn't make it. Her and her cousin were now orphaned. Her phone was returned to her and she looked at the messages, the first one, Mom, "Hey May something happened, I'm coming over to Becca's to pick you up, I'll explain in the car." The second message, Peter, "May! Where r u? Uncle Ben's been shot and I haven't heard from Aunt May since she went to pick you up. I'm scared she might have gotten hurt. Text me back!" May was crying as she asked, "Where's Pete? Does he know about Mom?" The officer told her that her cousin was being interviewed in the department and an officer took her to him. They both sat there crying, holding and supporting each other. They had to sell most of their stuff and move into an orphanage, at least until May, Who was 3 years older than Peter, turned 18, May is 16 and Peter is 13. Close to Pete's 14 birthday is when he gained his powers and by this time May had become a problem child, she ran off, she partied and drank and had sex. One night though she didn't come home, the police found her in an alley near death. In the ER they told Peter that the only way he could save her was through blood transfusion. He didn't know about the powers and gave it willingly. The loss of blood though caused his body, which was now changing, to faint. He awoke next to his cousin, who blamed herself for Peter being hospitalized. Weeks later he learned the full extent of his powers and began watching May to see if his blood caused similar mutations, it did.

Upon turning 18 the now clean May took up the responsibility of being her 16 year old cousin's guardian. They were a crime fighting team and through both of their jobs could afford a small apartment in the city.

14533.content: What about the four other identities peter took during the Identity Crisis storyline?
14533.title: more please

145331.content:
first identity-Ricochet

After being accused of murder, peter took up four new personas to continue to help people. One of the personas that he adopted was Ricochet. Starting with a leather jacket with an R on it, Parker's wife Mary Jane created a costume and weapons. Ricochet was similar to Spider-Man, but even more jocular. He relied primarily on his agility, and posed as a criminal for hire. He also uses metal disks to subdue thugs.
145331.title: yes

1453312.content:
second identity-hornet

After being accused of murder, peter took up four new personas to continue to help people. The Hornet costume was designed by Mary Jane Watson-Parker and the weapon gauntlets were designed by Spider-Man based on Ben Reilly's stinger darts. The cybernetically-controlled wing harness was designed by Hobie Brown, the Prowler, who never used it as it was too heavy to be worn by a person of normal strength. Spider-Man, however, was easily able to wear it.
1453312.title: another identity

14533122.content:
third identity-dusk

After being accused of murder, peter took up four new personas to continue to help people. One of the identities he adopted was that of Dusk. As Dusk, he pretended to be a mercenary with a quiet and serious personality, and teamed up with Trapster, who had in fact framed him for murder under Norman Osborn's orders by using a duplicate of Spider-Man's webbing to kill a small-time crook called Joey Z. After helping the Trapster escape an attack from the Shocker, Trapster and Dusk became regular allies, taking out some of Osborn's various criminal activities across the city. Although Dusk failed to record a confrontation between Trapster and Osborn where Osborn admitted his role in the murder, he was able to convince the Trapster that the best way to hurt Osborn now was to admit his role in framing Spider-Man for Joey Z's murder.
14533122.title: another identity

145331222.content:
Final Identity-Prodigy

After being framed for murder Peter donned four alternate personas. Prodigy was supposed to be the goody-two-shoes character of the four.

153311.content:
Black Cat stood on the top of a skyscraper looking at the full moon. A church bell rang somewhere nearby, but Felicia paid it no mind. Spiderman had been flirting with her the past few months, but had broken things off recently after half mentioning something about a girlfriend.

"What a jerk." Felicia sighed. She wished some trouble would come up just to distract her but the night was unusually calm. After hours of watching and waiting, Felicia was ready to call it a night. Unbeknownst to her the venom symbiote, freshly ripped from Peter's skin, had crawled its way up to her. Seeing a potential host just as powerful as its last the symbiote, struck forward like a snake, and engulfed her boot.

"The hell!" Felicia gasped at the sight of the black liquid squirming up her leg. She tried to shake it off but her foot wouldn't budge from the ground. A tendril launched off the main mass and clung to her other leg sealing her in place. Felicia grunted as she tried to break free. She could feel her clothing torn and ripped apart underneath the alien goo and the warm tight feeling of the symbiote taking its place. The symbiote was slowly climbing up her thighs, below it her legs now tightly clad in the shiny, ebony, alien skin. her feet clawed. She tried to pull it off her legs but it felt like she was ripping her own skin. When she pulled her hands away the symbiote had globed on them and began to transform her hands and push up her arms. The warm embrace of the symbiote now reached her past her waist and she arced her back and moaned at the odd but pleasurable sensation. Now up to her neck, she felt power flowing through her,she felt stronger, faster, just all around better than ever before.

"This is amazing." Felicia said looking at her now clawed hands.

"Yes, just bond with us and it's all your." The symbiote whispered in to her mind.

"Bond?" Felicia asked.

"Let us become one and all your desires will be yours." It responded.

The symbiote now enveloped her head, she could hear the voice more clearly. Its seductive whispers became harder and harder to ignore.
153311.title: Black Cat/ Felicia

List of the Klyntar infected humans, list will ensue, lets start off with the one that is not like the other the DC/Marvel crossover villains

Bizarnage-Bizarnage is the Amalgam of Bizarro and Carnage.
153321.title: yeah

1533212.content: Start off by splitting off the five life foundation members, Agony, Lasher, Phage, Riot, and Scream
1533212.title: Marvel only Symbiote

15332121.content: Agony-One of the five symbiotes forcibly spawned from the Venom symbiote by the Life Foundation.
15332121.title: Life foundation

153321212.content: Lasher-One of the five symbiotes forcibly spawned from the Venom symbiote by the Life Foundation.
153321212.title: other four

1533212122.content: Phage-One of the five symbiotes forcibly spawned from the Venom symbiote by the Life Foundation.
1533212122.title: other three

15332121222.content:
Riot-One of the five symbiotes forcibly spawned from Venom by the Life Foundation.
or
Scream-One of the five symbiotes forcibly spawned from the Venom symbiote by the Life Foundation. She eventually killed her symbiote siblings, and served as an enemy of both Venom and Spider-Man for some time. She has since been killed by Eddie Brock.
15332121222.title: other two

15332122.content: Hybrid-Desperate to survive, Venom's children Agony, Phage, Lasher, and Riot merged into a single entity to defend themselves from their sister Scream, and then joined with former Guardsmen, Scott Washington, to become the symbiote hero known as Hybrid.
15332122.title: other symbiote

1533212221.content: Carnage-Carnage is the offspring of the alien symbiote Venom. It bonded with the crazed serial killer, Cletus Kasady, thus creating one of Spider-Man's most murderous, brutal, and lethal adversaries. But the simbiote created others and bonded with other people too so Carnage or a Carnage born symbiote
1533212221.title: sure

15332122211.content:

or

Cletus Cassidy
15332122211.title: many faces of Carnage

15332122212.content:
Scorn(After transformation)-Shriek's Psychiatrist at Ravencroft who becomes the new host for the Carnage symbiote. She later gains her own symbiote, a spawn of Carnage, and names herself Scorn.


Toxin

Toxin is the symbiote spawn/son of the vicious symbiote Carnage, and grandson of Venom. Toxin is also the most powerful of the symbiotes. Eddie Brock (former Venom, Anti-Venom) has been forcibly bonded to the Toxin symbiote.
15332122212.title: child of Carnage

1533212222.content: Krobaa-Krobaa is an entity from the pits of darkness. He is also one of the very few Symbiotes not spawned from Venom. Eddie Brock took on and defeated Krobaa with the flash on his camera.
1533212222.title: other

15332122222.content: Marcus-"The Centaur Werewolf Symbiote Warrior". Marcus is the strongest monster under Dracula's command; he was born a Centaur, bitten by a werewolf, and bound to an alien symbiote.

153321222222.content: Mayhem-The possible clone of May Parker (Spider-Girl). She was biologically reengineered to be a symbiote hybrid. After naming herself April in order to interact with ordinary life, she gave herself the name Mayhem to operate under in her superhuman activities.

154.content:
I don't think there is a rule on gory stories so I will go full in on options.

regular version- robot-wings

noire version- (Warning:Not suitable for children or even young teens) In this version Green Goblin's goons mugged Uncle Ben and Vulture finished him off, by eating him, in front of Peter. Note:If using this version spidey will have a deathly hatred for vulture and will no hold his punches.

thirdly, a mutant version,
154.title: Vulture

155.content:
Here's another pair then:

Stegron; Doctor Vincent Stegron, self-styled Dinosaur Man who combined Stegosaur DNA with his own having gotten the idea from Dr Connors.

Sauron: No, not the Giant Eye who desired the One Ring. The Pterosaurian life-draining mutant. Technically a foe of the X-Men, but frequently in the same continuity as Spider-Man.
155.title: More villains to choose from

1553.content:
Rhino-Aleksei Sytsevich, an immigrant from Russia. One day he was contacted by some Eastern Bloc agents, who offered him a vast sum of money for participating in an incredible experiment. Sytsevich agreed, and was subjected to intensive chemical and radioactive treatment, which bonded a super-strong polymer to his skin and greatly augmented his strength and speed. He was given the code name "Rhino," and was sent to work as a super-assassin.

Scorpion-Mac Gargan was a private investigator that J. Jonah Jameson hired to keep tabs on Peter Parker and Spider-Man, to see if the two had any connection with one another, but Peter's spider-sense alerts him to evade Gargan. Eventually J. Jonah Jameson paid Mac Gargan to undergo a procedure by Dr. Farley Stillwell in order to defeat Spider-Man. He has proportionate abilities of a scorpion gained from a mechanical power-suit to give him a durable exoskeleton with cybernetic stinger.

Electro-Maxwell Dillion, was an extremely intelligent scientist, he became a repair man after his wife left. When a fellow line repairman was knocked unconscious and stuck on a high pole with dangerous wires loose, Maxwell was requested by his employer to save the lineman’s life. After saving the man a bolt of lightning struck Maxwell knocking him off the pole seemingly killing him. However, Maxwell later discovered that he gained some form of electric powers. After stealing a super suit from Stark Industries and killing a man he was indebted to he became a full fledged super-villain.
1553.title: More villains

15531.content:
Two options,

Typical rhino-Whether by suit or dna mutation he is permanently a rhino/human hybrid

Ultimate rhino/Amazing Spiderman Rhino-Giant suit 15-20 feet tall, Alex rides inside

info.brief_description: Any story you see fit to make about this Arachnid Superhero.  Or anyone else in his world.
info.description:
The life and times of Spider-Man and all in his life. What will become of them, with each decision that come their way? Or those that they had a major effect on?


The Rules are simple:

All Marvel Realities are accepted.

Unless it's to provide additional options for others, and then no more than two consecutive chapters, keep the chapters good and meaty.

Pay attention to the previous chapters.

Maintain good grammar throughout.


Now. Enter.
